dmca.title: Individual complains of blogged photo
dmca.body:
To whom it may concern, 

The post at the following URL contains a copyright image owned by me: 
http://thetruthfairy.blogspot.com/2006/03/inspired-by-cowardly-exit-of-quit_03.html 
http://photosl.blogger.com/blogger/5379/1749/320/fatracheldoyleisugly.jpg 
The original, is. here:. 
http://static.flickr.com/27/60628127_cb64281f2b.jpg 
The post at the following URL contains a copyright image owned by me: 
http://thetruthfairy.blogspot.com/2006/03/attention-lawyers-solicitors-pussy-ass. html http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5379/1749/400fsostupidhahjpg 
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5379/1749/400/asswipe.jpg 
The originals are here: 
http://static.flickr.com/34/66316225_60d2f54c22.jpg 
and 
http://static.flickr.com/18/24126362_a92620371f_o.jpg 
As your user nor blogger has neither asked for nor received permission to use the Work as the basis for http:/fphotosl.blogger.com/blogger/5379/1749/320/fatracheldoyleisugly.jpg, http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5379/ 1749/400/sostupidhah.jpg and 
http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/5379/1749/400/asswipe.jpg nor to make or distribute copies, including electronic copies, of same, I believe you and your user have willfully infringed my rights under 17 U.S.C. Section 101 et seq and could be liable for statutory damages as high as $150,000 as set forth in Section 504(c)(2) therein. 

I demand that you immediately cease the use and distribution of all infringing works derived from the Work, and all copies, including electronic copies, of same, that you deliver to me, if applicable, all unused, undistributed copies of same, or destroy such copies immediately and that you desist from this or any other infringement of my rights in the future. If I have not received an affirmative response from you by March 10, 2006 indicating that you have fully complied with these requirements, I shall take further action against you, which will also include the slander and libel found on this blog that has harmed my personal and business life. The text that is on the stolen images on blogspot was added with full intent of harm by user. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Glendale AZ 85307
